##### VISITOR MANAGEMENT

# Welcome visitors and manage the flow  
of your workplace

Going to the office should be a welcoming and frictionless experience for all.
From pre-registration to check-in to printing visitor badges, Appspace Visitor
Management makes the process an easy one. It runs on multiple devices and
integrates with the apps and tools you already use, like Google calendar and
Microsoft Outlook.

SEE IT IN ACTION

# How does Visitor Management work?

# How does  
Visitor Management work?

See Appspace Visitor Management in action.

**Speed up check-in**  
  
From QR codes for touchless check-in to  
pre-registration, simplify the whole process.

**Supercharge security**  
  
Track and manage who’s coming and going for  
a secure workplace.

**Make the right first impression**  
  
With a sleek system and interactive kiosks, every visitor will feel like a
VIP.

##### FOR VISITORS

# Make their visit all joy  
and no hassle

# Make their visit  
all joy  
and no hassle

#####  Control access for a safer workplace

Safety first, right? From health forms to NDAs, track visitors and guests with
checkpoints that ensure everyone’s wellbeing.

#####  Keep the human connection

Faster and easier shouldn’t mean cold and impersonal. With Appspace Visitor
Management, hosts get instant notifications, so they can greet visitors in
person and set the right tone from the start.

#####  Smooth sailing from start to finish

Speed up check-in for clients, vendors, and VIPs. Before they even set foot in
your office, they can quickly fill out a form to capture photos, privacy
agreements, and anything else you need for a swift and secure check-in
process.

#####  Goodbye long lines, hello efficiency

We’ve all been there: the front desk bottleneck. But with self-service,
touchscreen kiosks, guests and visitors can breeze through the check-in
process – and even opt for mobile check-in by scanning a handy QR code.

#####  Welcome visitors with style

Easily create and print professional visitor badges and keep your workplace
secure with QR codes to keep track of who’s coming and going.

#####  Control access for a safer workplace

Safety first, right? From health forms to NDAs, track visitors and guests with
checkpoints that ensure everyone’s wellbeing.

#####  Keep the human connection

Faster and easier shouldn’t mean cold and impersonal. With Appspace Visitor
Management, hosts get instant notifications, so they can greet visitors in
person and set the right tone from the start.

__

__

###  A personal experience Keep the human connection

Faster and easier shouldn’t mean cold and impersonal. With Appspace Visitor
Management, hosts get instant notifications, so they can greet visitors in
person and set the right tone from the start.

###  Easy registration: Smooth sailing from start to finish

Speed up check-in for clients, vendors, and VIPs. Before they even set foot in
your office, they can quickly fill out a form to capture photos, privacy
agreements, and anything else you need for a swift and secure check-in
process.

###  Visitor kiosk: Goodbye long lines, hello efficiency

We've all been there: the front desk bottleneck. But with self-service,
touchscreen kiosks, guests and visitors can breeze through the check-in
process – and even opt for mobile check-in by scanning a handy QR code.

###  Badge printing: Welcome visitors with style

Easily create and print professional visitor badges and keep your workplace
secure with QR codes to keep track of who’s coming and going.

###  Simple checkpoints: Control access for a safer workplace

Safety first, right? From health forms to NDAs, track visitors and guests with
checkpoints that ensure everyone's wellbeing.

FOR HOSTS

# Make hosting look effortless

# Make hosting  
look effortless

##### AUTOMATIC UPDATES

No more guessing – keep hosts updated

Stay well-informed every step of the way. With Appspace, hosts get timely and
relevant notifications throughout the process, starting from pre-registration
all the way to their visitor’s arrival.

##### CHOOSE YOUR CHANNEL

Notifications where you want them

We get that different hosts have different communication preferences. Whether
you prefer email, Microsoft Teams, Slack, or Webex, select the channel that
works best for you, and get real-time updates.

FOR HOSTS

# Make hosting  
look effortless

Notifications where you want them

We get that different hosts have different communication preferences. Whether

for you, and get real-time updates.

##### FOR ADMINISTRATORS

## Admins, we’ve got  
your back

###  APP INTEGRATIONS  
Sync up to save time

Juggle apps and disrupt your workflow? Never. Sync up with the tools you
already rely on, including Microsoft Outlook and Teams, and popular calendar
providers like Google.

###  ADMINISTRATOR TOOLS  
Keep your workplace safe  
and compliant for all

Facilitators, listen up. With the Visitor Management dashboard in the Appspace
console (or via the Employee App), you can view and manage visitors like a
pro, whether it's for the day, week, or beyond.

###  ACTIONABLE ANALYTICS  
Make better data-driven decisions

With valuable insights on visitor patterns, behavior, and preferences, you can
identify security risks and bottlenecks in your check-in process for a safer,
more efficient experience.

###  A CONNECTED PLATFORM  
Manage your whole workplace

Because Visitor Management is part of the Appspace platform, it integrates
with our other solutions. Imagine being able to welcome guests on digital
signage or provide them wayfinding to go right to their meeting room.

##### INTEGRATIONS

## Even more ways to manage your workplace

###  Guest Wi-Fi

Bring the hospitality factor with secure network access.

###  Badge scanning

Speed up check-in and capture data.

###  Access Management Integration (AMI)

Make sure everyone on site is authorized to be there.

###  Custom content cards

Personalize your  
visitors’ experience.

###  Sensors

Automatically initiate the check-in process.

###  Virtual assistants

Cut wait times with quick, automated help.

###  Watchlists

Screen visitors to keep danger out.

###  Thermo-scanning

Catch potential health  
risks fast.

FAQS

# Questions?

# We’ve got answers

What is Appspace Visitor Management?

__ __

It’s a comprehensive solution that empowers organizations to effortlessly
manage and track visitors entering their premises.

How does Appspace Visitor Management work?

__ __

It’s software that streamlines visitor check-ins. Visitors can pre-register or
check in on-site, while hosts receive real-time notifications and sleek
visitor badges.

What are the key features?

__ __

From visitor pre-registration and self-service kiosks to, host notifications,
visitor tracking, compliance and security measures, and reporting
capabilities, Appspace Visitor Management provides everything organizations
need to manage the flow of their workplace.

Can Appspace Visitor Management integrate with other systems?

__ __

Yes! It integrates with various apps and tools, including Microsoft Outlook
and Teams, as well as calendar providers like Google.

Can it be customized?

__ __

You bet! Appspace Visitor Management is highly customizable. Organizations can
tailor the check-in process and branding to match their specific requirements
and create an on-brand visitor experience.

Can Appspace Visitor Management be rolled out in a multi-location deployment?

__ __

Yes, Appspace Visitor Management supports multi-location deployments, so it’s
great for organizations with multiple offices or facilities. Get ready for
centralized management and reporting across the board.

How does visitor management help with security?

__ __

Appspace improves workplace security by providing real-time visitor tracking
and data capture.

Can Appspace help with compliance requirements?

__ __

Absolutely! Appspace Visitor Management offers features that help with
compliance requirements, including visitor data privacy controls, visitor data
retention policies, and customizable visitor agreements and waivers.

Can Appspace Visitor Management generate reports?

__ __

Yes, Appspace Visitor Management includes robust reporting capabilities. It
can generate reports on check-in and check-out times, visitor patterns,
compliance metrics, and more, giving you the insights you need to manage your
workplace.

How easy is it to use Appspace Visitor Management?

__ __

Appspace Visitor Management is designed with a user-friendly interface. Its
intuitive web-based platform and mobile app make it easy for visitors and
hosts to navigate and use the system with ease.
